name: The most Russophobic game clicker kill russians orks
name_original: The most Russophobic game clicker kill russians orks
description: In this game you will play as a Ukrainian defender who destroys the russian horde, you can help Bandera strips, Joe Biden, a stronghold tank, the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the ghost of Kiev, Azov, and a nuclear warhead to Moscow! Consider this the most Russophobic game.
